CN.content:

Paragraph: It appears that this type of fibril domain occurred because PQCDTB formed effective π-π stacking based on outstanding crystallinity.

So, the "Material Name" entity in the paragraph is "PQCDTB".

Paragraph: It appears that this type of fibril domain occurred because PQCDTB formed effective π-π stacking based on outstanding crystallinity.

1. PQCDTB: This is a specific compound name, so it can be considered a Property Name representing the identity of the molecule or substance that formed the fibril domain.

1. crystallinity: This is a material property that refers to the degree of orderliness in the arrangement of atoms or molecules in a solid material. In this context, it is mentioned as a factor contributing to the formation of the fibril domain through effective π-π stacking of PQCDTB.
